Description: Welcome to Colonialgames2015 Auctions! Quality, items - Guaranteed!You are bidding on a Pair of 1980's B&L Ray-Ban W0503 Black Chrome G15 UV Explorer, size 62/14 Men's Large, Aviator Sunglasses with case. The glasses are in near mint condition, well taken care of, no issues. The lenses have no visible scratches, nor do they have hazing. Includes original case. 62/14 are large men's size. Both lenses are engraved B& L, and printing on top bar and it's underside. Frame and arms are "Black Chrome" finish. Lenses are the gray/green version. I've completely inspected these, hinges, nose pads, glass and arms are in great condition. The nose pads are monogrammed with B&L also. I completely cleaned the nose pads, frames, arms and lenses with alcohol, ready to wear. Most items are *used* unless otherwise stated. All items are cleaned, tested and in good working condition when sold. If your item develops a problem within 10 days of receipt, I will give you a replacement or if none is available, money back in full. Please contact me before making a return. USA Shipping: 16.00 US(Tracked Packet). Canada shipping: 16.00 US(Expedited Pacel w/ tracking and insurance included). We will combine items to save you $ on shipping. Payment Options: Paypal. Payment must be received within 6 days or we will follow ebay's guidelines pertaining to non-paying bidders & your item may be re-listed. Important: Please feel free to make payment for your auction before we contact you. Orders that need a combined shipping quote may wait for us to contact you if you like. We will contact you within a few hours of auction end! Thank-you! Feedback Policy: We will leave you positive feedback within a few days of auction end. If you are pleased with your item(s) please leave us positive feedback, if you have a question or concern, please email us before leaving feedback. Pay me securely with any major credit card through PayPal! Thank-you for shopping with Colonialgames2015. Please bookmark us, we're always adding new items & often rare vintage games & systems!
